Python API

pioner.back

Backend, server part. Everything related to Raspberry Pi & PyTango

daq_device.py module

class pioner.back.daq_device.DaqDeviceHandler(params: DaqParams)

Class to handle connection to DAQ device

connect()
disconnect()
get() → uldaq.DaqDevice
get_ai_device() → uldaq.AiDevice
get_ao_device() → uldaq.AoDevice
get_descriptor() → uldaq.DaqDeviceDescriptor
is_connected() → bool
quit()
release()
reset()
try_connect(timeout: int = 60, sleep_time: int = 1)
class pioner.back.daq_device.DaqParams

General class to represent main DAQ parameters …

Attributes

namestr

first name of the person

surnamestr

family name of the person

ageint

age of the person

Methods

info(additional=””):

Prints the person’s name and age.

pioner.front

Frontend, user interfaces part. GUI and command-line communication

pioner.shared

Methods, common for backend and frontend parts.
